short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask questions about the current webpage using Google Gemini API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebGemAI: Your Intelligent Web Companion

Unlock the power of AI-driven web browsing with WebGemAI, the cutting-edge Chrome extension that transforms how you interact with web content. Powered by Google's advanced Gemini AI, WebGemAI offers instant, context-aware answers to your questions about any webpage you're viewing.

Key Features:

1. Intelligent Context Understanding:
   WebGemAI captures the visible content of your current webpage, allowing the AI to understand the context of your questions with remarkable accuracy.

2. Real-time Updates:
   As you scroll or navigate, WebGemAI automatically updates its understanding of the page, ensuring that your questions are always answered based on the most current information.

3. Multilingual Support:
   Communicate in your preferred language! WebGemAI supports over 30 languages, making it a truly global tool for web exploration.

4. User-Friendly Interface:
   With a sleek, intuitive chat-like interface, asking questions and receiving answers is as easy as having a conversation.

5. Privacy-Focused:
   Your data stays yours. WebGemAI processes information locally and doesn't store or transmit your personal data or browsing history.

6. Customizable Experience:
   Easily switch between languages or manually update the page context with a single click, tailoring the experience to your needs.

7. Instant Answers:
   Get concise, relevant answers to your questions about web content without leaving the page or opening new tabs.

8. Broad Compatibility:
   Works seamlessly across various websites, from news articles and research papers to product pages and documentation.

Perfect for:
- Students researching complex topics
- Professionals seeking quick insights from lengthy documents
- Non-native speakers navigating content in unfamiliar languages
- Curious minds looking to dive deeper into any web content

WebGemAI is more than just a web extension; it's your personal AI assistant for the internet. Whether you're conducting research, trying to understand a complex article, or simply curious about something you've read, WebGemAI is there to provide instant, intelligent assistance.

Experience the future of web browsing with WebGemAI. Install now and transform every webpage into an interactive, AI-powered knowledge base!

Note: This extension requires a Gemini API key from Google AI Studio. Instructions for obtaining and entering your API key are provided upon installation.
